name: SONG OF KNIGHTROID
description:
this is an interactive rpg-film about Acme Iku and Princess Knight Riyona, vocal synthesizers made out of porn and screaming.

this is an interactive rpg-film about Acme Iku and Princess Knight Riyona, stars of the virtually unknown N64 game, Song of Knightroid.

this is an interactive rpg-film about Acme Iku and Princess Knight Riyona, human girls trying to survive.
